pull.title: [wallet] Refactor relay transactions
pull.body:
Refactor `CWalletTx::RelayWalletTransaction()` function.

This was a suggestion from the wallet-node separation PR: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15288#discussion_r256036330, which we deferred until after the main PR was merged.

There are also makes two minor behavior changes:

- no longer assert if fBroadcastTransactions is false. Just return false from the function.
- no longer print the relay message if p2pEnabled is set to false (since the transaction is not actually relayed).

events.body:
~The first three commits are from https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15632. Please review that PR first.~

Base PR has been merged. This is ready for review.
utACK afb608b, since the refactor improves code comments and avoids nesting code.

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
No conflicts as of last run.

utACK afb608b1e92773aba2698b698bcf62011ff7b783. This isn't a pure refactoring so you may want to point out changes in behavior in the commit description (no longer asserting false if GetBroadcastTransactions if false, no longer printing relay message if p2pEnabled is false).

Commit log and PR description updated.

This will require rebase since https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15632 has been updated. I don't intend to do that until #15632 is merged to avoid multiple iterations of rebase/review.
utACK 57516ebdfcd288cb6c255fb0fbc94b7fb1e50af7 (just last commits, not base commits). Only change since last review is updating commit description.

issue.title: refactor: Replace chain relayTransactions/submitMemoryPool by higher method
issue.body:
Remove CWalletTx::AcceptToMemoryPool

Replace CWalletTx::RelayWalletTransaction by SubmitMemoryPoolAndRelay


Add a relay flag to broadcastTransaction because wasn't sure of ReacceptWalletTransactions semantic.

Obviously, working on implementing https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14978#issuecomment-459373984 to add the new higher-method in Node interface, will add a commit, just need more thought to do it cleanly

events.message:
[wallet] Refactor CWalletTx::RelayWalletTransaction()

This refactors the CWalletTx::RelayWalletTransaction() function to be
clearer and adds comments. It also makes two minor behavior
changes:

- no longer assert if fBroadcastTransactions is false. Just return false
from the function.
- no longer print the relay message if p2pEnabled is set to false (since
the transaction is not actually relayed).

events.body: utACK 7a9046e48d0aac35e8e6a3dd315aa98a207bebfe. No changes at all, just rebase after base PR #15632 was merged

comments.body: This comment is replaced by the `Don't relay conflicted or already confirmed transactions` comment above the call to `GetDepthInMainChain()`.
Nit: Extra `;` at end of line :-)
Thanks @practicalswift. That commit is from https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15632, where I've now removed the extraneous `;`. Do you mind reviewing that PR?
